title: News: Los Campesinos announce UK tour dates
body:
**[Los Campesinos](http://www.loscampesinos.com/wheat/los-campesinos-uk-tour-march-2012/ "UK gig dates Los Campesinos")! have announced a UK tour on their website this morning, the first ‘proper’ set of tour dates in the UK for the indie pop seven piece since February 2010.**

In 2012 Los Campesinos! will be playing shows across the UK starting a the Phoenix in Exeter on the 20th of March and finishing up the tour in the Leadmill, Sheffield on the 31st;

Mar 20 – PHOENIX, EXETER (14+)  
Mar 21 – THEKLA, BRISTOL (14+)  
Mar 22 – ELECTRIC BALLROOM, LONDON (14+)  
Mar 23 – 02 ACADEMY, OXFORD (14+)  
Mar 24 – RAINBOW WAREHOUSE, BIRMINGHAM (16+)  
Mar 26 – ACADEMY 3, MANCHESTER (14+)  
Mar 27 – O2 ACADEMY 2, LIVERPOOL (14+)  
Mar 28 – CABARET VOLTAIRE, EDINBURGH (14+)  
Mar 29 – ACADEMY 2, NEWCASTLE (14+)  
Mar 30 – WATERFRONT, NORWICH (14+)  
Mar 31 – LEADMILL, SHEFFIELD (14+)

You can already buy tickets from the official Los Campesinos [website](http://www.loscampesinos.com/gigs/ "buy tickets UK tour Los Campesinos ")  and the tour tickets will be on general sale from Wednesday. Support is still to be announced. The band also announced a tour across the US & an appearance on the David Letterman show in the following months. Los Campesino’s fourth full-length release, [Hello Sadness](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hello_Sadness "Hello Sadness") was released on 14 November 2011.
